content: A recent audit revealed delays in processing claims for pelvic floor dysfunction treatments at Pine Ridge Health System. Providers noted inconsistent documentation requirements under Policy PFD-312, particularly for patients aged 30-40 receiving biofeedback therapy. The audit tracked 47 cases between January and March 2024, showing an average processing time of 18 days compared to the network standard of 10 days. Adjusters flagged missing CPT codes for 32% of submissions.
